hero.title: Diffa Tours
hero.subtitle: Explore the magic of Morocco with unforgettable experiences

welcome.subtitle: WELCOME TO DIFFA TOURS
welcome.title: Your travel agency in the heart of authentic Morocco
welcome.description: Discover Morocco like never before with Diffa Tours, your preferred partner for unforgettable adventures. Whether you dream of exploring the lively streets of Marrakech, relaxing on the golden beaches of Agadir and Taghazout, or experiencing the desert under a starry sky, we create tailor-made tours and excursions that reveal the cultural richness, breathtaking landscapes, and legendary hospitality of the Kingdom. Let yourself be guided by our passion and local expertise.

gallery.quote: Authentic experiences that tell the story of Morocco

experiences.subtitle: UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCES
experiences.title: Explore the wonders of Morocco with our tailor-made tours

atlas.title: Atlas Excursions
atlas.description: Explore the majestic mountains of the Moroccan Atlas. Guided hikes, visits to authentic Berber villages, spectacular waterfalls, and breathtaking panoramas. A total immersion in nature and Berber culture.

desert.title: Desert Adventures
desert.description: Experience the magic of the Moroccan desert. Camel rides, nights under the stars in Berber camps, 4x4 safaris, and discovery of the Merzouga dunes. An unforgettable adventure in the heart of the Sahara.

cultural.title: Cultural Discoveries
cultural.description: Immerse yourself in the cultural richness of Morocco. Visits to historic medinas, traditional souks, emblematic palaces and monuments. Meet local artisans and discover authentic Moroccan craftsmanship.

testimonial.subtitle: TESTIMONIALS FROM OUR TRAVELERS
testimonial.quote: An exceptional experience with Diffa Tours! The organization was perfect, the guides passionate, and the discoveries unforgettable. Morocco revealed all its beauty to us thanks to this professional team. Highly recommended!

propertyPhotos.quote: Inspired by our history, surrounded by nature to offer a different experience

excursions.subtitle: DISCOVER OUR EXCEPTIONAL EXCURSIONS AND TOURS
excursions.title: Our popular excursions

ourika.title: Ourika Valley Excursion
ourika.description: Discover the magnificent Ourika Valley, nestled at the foot of the Atlas Mountains. Admire the refreshing waterfalls, visit authentic Berber villages, and enjoy breathtaking landscapes. An unforgettable nature getaway less than an hour from Marrakech.

quad.title: Quad Safari in Agafay Desert
quad.description: Experience the ultimate adventure with our quad safari through the golden dunes of the Agafay desert. Thrills guaranteed with an experienced guide, traditional mint tea, and spectacular sunset over the dunes. Perfect for adrenaline lovers.

imperial.title: 7-Day Complete Tour - Imperial Cities
imperial.description: Discover the essence of Morocco with our imperial cities tour: Marrakech, Fez, Meknes, and Rabat. Explore thousand-year-old medinas, sumptuous palaces, and lively souks. Accommodation in charming riads, French-speaking guide, and air-conditioned transport included for a comfortable experience.

newsletter.subtitle: STAY INFORMED WITH DIFFA TOURS
newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive our best travel offers, new tours, and exclusive promotions.

footer.addressText: Diffa Tours, Avenue Mohammed V, Gueliz District, Marrakech, Morocco
footer.copyright: © Copyright Diffa Tours. All rights reserved.

taghazout.title: Taghazout Excursions

cta.quote: Create unforgettable memories with Diffa Tours

hero.title: Marrakech Excursions
hero.description: Discover the southern pearl, between bustling souks and majestic monuments

marrakechPage.subtitle: THE RED CITY
marrakechPage.title: Explore the wonders of Marrakech
marrakechPage.description: Marrakech, the red city, is an essential destination in Morocco. Discover its historic medinas, lush gardens, sumptuous palaces, and colorful souks. Our excursions take you to the heart of this fascinating city for an authentic and memorable experience.

activities.medina: Guided tour of the medina and traditional souks
activities.majorelle: Discovery of Majorelle Gardens and Yves Saint Laurent Museum
activities.palaces: Exploration of Bahia and El Badi palaces
activities.ourika: Excursion to Ourika Valley and Atlas Mountains
activities.jemaa: Horse carriage ride and visit to Jemaa el-Fna square
activities.cooking: Culinary experience and Moroccan cooking class
activities.agafay: Desert excursion to Agafay with dinner under the stars

hero.title: Agadir Excursions
hero.description: Enjoy the sun, beach, and coastal adventures

agadirPage.subtitle: THE PEARL OF THE SOUTH
agadirPage.title: Discover the treasures of Agadir
agadirPage.description: Agadir, Morocco's modern seaside resort, offers year-round sunny weather, golden beaches, and a multitude of activities. From relaxing by the ocean to excursions in the hinterland, our tours will show you all facets of this magnificent city.

activities.souk: Visit to Souk El Had and discovery of local crafts
activities.paradise: Excursion to Paradise Valley and swimming in waterfalls
activities.kasbah: Visit to the Kasbah and panoramic view of the bay
activities.essaouira: Excursion to Essaouira, the windy city

hero.title: Tours in Morocco
hero.description: Travel through Morocco from end to end with our organized tours

circuitsPage.subtitle: ORGANIZED TRIPS
circuitsPage.title: Complete tours across Morocco
circuitsPage.description: Explore Morocco in depth with our organized tours. From the Sahara Desert to imperial cities, from the Atlas Mountains to Atlantic coasts, our carefully designed itineraries offer you a complete immersion in Moroccan culture and landscapes.

activities.imperial: 5-day Imperial Cities: Fez, Meknes, Rabat and Marrakech
activities.south: 7-day Great South of Morocco: From Casablanca to Merzouga
activities.north: 4-day Northern Morocco: Tangier, Chefchaouen and Tetouan
activities.atlas: 6-day Atlas and Valleys Tour: Mountains and oases
activities.complete: 10-day Complete Tour of Morocco: The kingdom's essentials

hero.title: Taghazout Excursions
hero.description: The paradise for surfers and nature lovers

taghazoutPage.subtitle: SURFERS VILLAGE
taghazoutPage.title: Experience the Taghazout spirit
taghazoutPage.description: Taghazout, a small fishing village that has become a world-renowned surf spot, offers perfect waves year-round. Between surf sessions, yoga on the beach, and exploration of wild coves, discover this authentic place where Berber culture and bohemian atmosphere blend.

activities.surf: Surf lessons for all levels on the best spots
activities.yoga: Yoga and meditation facing the ocean
activities.beaches: Beach exploration: Anchor Point, Killer Point, Hash Point
activities.village: Visit to the fishing village and discovery of local crafts
activities.paradise: Excursion to Paradise Valley from Taghazout
